section.p: You may configure each monitored AWS account to attempt to discover and monitor the guest Linux or Windows operating systems running within each EC2 instance, when specific Tags are present. This requires that your system has the network and server access it needs to monitor the guest operating system. VPC and non-VPC modes are supported.
The life cycles of guest operating system devices are managed along with the instance. For example,

ul.li: when the EC2 instance is stopped, guest operating system devices are set to a decommissioned production state
when the EC2 instance is destroyed, guest operating system devices are deleted
